name: Zombli
description:
A game where on the the day of holi, a zombie apocalypse occurs. Will you be able to survive or die lets find out.

Play the game here (read instructions before playing): https://studio.code.org/projects/gamelab/o5ydVONiFC72mPY7IiLFr4rdFLipOzoDOpFAllx...

Instructions:

WASD /Arrow keys to move.

Z/O to Shoot.

Shoot the zombies to earn points.

to heal get the healers.

reload the game to play again.
